page.title: 11Recreation in Lower Allerton
page.content: Lower{Allerton}has various recreational facilities-allotments,a park,tennis courts,cricket clubs,play- ing fields and adult education classes.{Ladyhill Park}has facilities for bowls,football,tennis,children's play.It is popular for walks and picnics. { Daisy Hill Methodist Cricket Club}is one of the oldest in the Bradford Sun- day School League.Its 50 members-Sen- iors,Juniors,under 15',under 12's-have a variety of ethnic backgrounds.They play 56 league matches each season. {Rhodesway Upper School}has adult education classes each Tuesday in the school year.These include typing(most popular),flower arranging,bridge,golf and cookery.
